participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, Maya enjoys expressing herself through dance and values her personal space.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i don't care about fashion.

participant_2.name: Dexter
participant_2.personality: Quirky and innovative, Dexter thrives in solitude and has a passion for technology and gaming.
participant_2.background: i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water.
